reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other Contractual Services NOC. Regional Police Training Capacity in the Caribbean. Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other U.S. Government Agency Contract Services

description.narrative: This award strives to help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability. More specifically, this includes Caribbean Basin Security Initiative.

To help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability; and for responding effectively against arising threats to national or international security and stability.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: U.S. Department of State Standard Terms and Conditions
A SUMMATIVE EVALUATION OF INTERNATIONAL NARCOTICS CONTROL AND LAW ENFORCEMENT (INCLE)-FUNDED CARIBBEAN BASIN SECURITY INITIATIVE (CBSI) ACTIVITIES
